Query.Sentence: SELECT route_id, name, description, estimated_duration, difficulty FROM ${mainschema}.route #WHERE# #ORDER#

SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM route R left JOIN ( select ssc.route_id as route_id, img_code from image i inner join ( SELECT image_route.route_id, MIN(image.image_id) as image_id FROM image INNER JOIN image_route ON image.image_id = image_route.image_id GROUP BY image_route.route_id ) SSC on SSC.image_id = i.image_id ) SC ON SC.route_id = R.route_id #WHERE# #ORDER#
SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ${mainschema}.route r INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.image_route ir ON r.route_id=ir.route_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.image i ON i.image_id=ir.image_id #WHERE# #ORDER#

SELECT r.route_id, r.name, r.description, r.estimated_duration, r.difficulty, i.image_id, i.img_code, rp.pck_id, rp.assigned_date FROM route r LEFT JOIN image_route ir ON r.route_id = ir.route_id LEFT JOIN image i ON ir.image_id = i.image_id LEFT JOIN route_pack rp ON r.route_id = rp.route_id #WHERE# #ORDER#

SELECT CASE WHEN R.difficulty = 1 THEN 'Facil' WHEN R.difficulty = 2 THEN 'Intermedio' WHEN R.difficulty = 3 THEN 'Dificil' WHEN R.difficulty = 4 THEN 'Extremo' END AS difficulty, COUNT(R.route_id) AS route_difficulty_count FROM ${mainschema}.route R GROUP BY difficulty; #ORDER#
